code: var validation=function validation(values){var errors={};if(!values.email){errors.email="Email is required.";}else if(!/\S+@\S+\.\S+/.test(values.email)){errors.email="Email is Invaild.";}if(!values.password){errors.password="Password is required.";}else if(values.password.length<5){errors.password="Password must be more than five characters.";}return errors;};export default validation;
